statement.p: Manuela is conducting market research on the amount typically spent on the purchase of a first vehicle. Manuela has determined that the average cost of a first vehicle is 7700, and that the distribution of costs is normally distributed with a standard deviation of 540.
a. Find the probability that a single randomly selected first-time vehicle purchase is less than 6970. (Round to 4 decimal places.)
